attributes.action: Financial fairness for the inividual and their households
attributes.additional_details:
That the UK Government establish  Royal Commissions to investigate the policies,practices and ethics of those organisations that are involved in the supply and pricing of

a) Domestic energy,including all petroleum based products

b) Domestic financial services including banks,building societies and all other  providers of investment and savings/loan/credit card products.

To act quickly upon upon any recommendations and to ensure that regulatory bodies are diligent and accountable in their oversight.
